phew...after some hours of battling with bazel's build rules, I finally merged the codes into tf.contrib.layers. Here's the PR #6205.

I didn't put them in core/kernels, because as @sguada suggested, it currently has quite a lot limitations, and since I also wrote the layer function mimicking current tf.contrib.layers.layer_norm, I decided to put them under tf.contrb.layers

@ilblackdragon I would love to! Too bad my current financial state doesn't allow me to travel to Spain :(
